Name: MinimizeProjectDuration
Description: Minimize the total project duration in days

Name: MaximizeTeamVelocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint

Name: MinimizeBudgetOverrun
Description: Minimize the amount by which actual spending exceeds the budget

Name: MaximizeSprintGoalAchievement
Description: Maximize percentage of sprint goals achieved per sprint

Name: MinimizeBugCount
Description: Minimize number of blockers or bugs per sprint

Name: MaximizeFeatureThroughput
Description: Maximize number of features completed per release plan

Name: MaximizeTestPassRate
Description: Maximize percentage of passing tests in development snapshots

Name: MinimizeChangeRequests
Description: Minimize the number of change requests on feature documentation

Name: MaximizeStakeholderFeedback
Description: Maximize count of positive feedback entries in sprint reviews

Name: MaximizeOnTimeReleases
Description: Maximize the number of release plans delivered by planned date
